item.title: Getting started
item.description: Installation npm install feather-ts --save Components Feather provides two interfaces to turn any class into a component: Widget and ArrayWidget. Widget has a method init(el: Element) which is called when the component has been mounted to the dom. ArrayWidget tags classes that are added to arrays of a parent component. It has no init method, because initialization can be done in its constructor. Since feather has logic-less templates, the only way to swap out dom elements is via array bindings All decorators should be attached to the leaf class of a component.
